org.js4ms.ip.protocol.mld

Class MLDQueryMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.js4ms.common.util.logging.LoggableBase
      • org.js4ms.common.util.buffer.BufferBackedObject
        • org.js4ms.ip.protocol.icmp.ICMPv6Message
          • org.js4ms.ip.protocol.mld.MLDMessage
            • org.js4ms.ip.protocol.mld.MLDGroupMessage
              • org.js4ms.ip.protocol.mld.MLDQueryMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Loggable, IPMessage
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MLDv1QueryMessage, MLDv2QueryMessage

    public abstract class MLDQueryMessage
extends MLDGroupMessage
    Base class for v1 and v2 Multicast Listener Query classes. The two versions are differentiated by their length.
    Author:
    Gregory Bumgardner (gbumgard)
